title: Traditional medicines dominate covid-19 vaccine trials over allopathic
author: Neetu Chandra Sharma
description: As of July, a total of 203 trials were registered in the Clinical Trial Registry of India, of which 61.5% were related to the AYUSH interventions, while 30.7% were on allopathic drugs
cleaned_text: 2020, 05:12 PM IST] Traditional medicines dominate covid-19 vaccine trials over allopathic As of July, a total of 203 trials were registered in the Clinical Trial Registry of India, of which 61.5% were related to the AYUSH interventions, while 30.7% were on allopathic drugs [] NEW DELHI : Amidst race for covid-19 vaccine among pharmaceutical companies, close to two third of the clinical trials in India are being done on traditional medicines, like ayurveda and homeopathy - under the AYUSH system-- with highest public and private funding.
